name: @gjsify/docs
description: JavaScript / TypeScript documentations generated by TypeScript Type Definitions

scripts.start:gjs: yarn run build:docs:gjs && yarn run serve:gjs
scripts.start:node-gtk: yarn run build:docs:node-gtk && yarn run serve:node-gtk
scripts.start:try: yarn run build:docs:try && yarn run serve:try
scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.build:types:node-gtk: yarn run clear:types:node-gtk && ts-for-gir generate '*' -e node --useNamespace --moduleType commonjs --ignoreConflicts
scripts.build:types:gjs: yarn run clear:types:gjs && ts-for-gir generate '*' -e gjs --useNamespace --moduleType esm --ignoreConflicts
scripts.build:types: yarn run build:types:gjs && yarn run build:types:node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:node-gtk: yarn run clear:docs:node-gtk && yarn run typedoc --options ./packages/typedoc-custom-cli/typedoc.node.js --in ./@types/node-gtk
scripts.build:docs:gjs: yarn run clear:docs:gjs && yarn run typedoc --options ./packages/typedoc-custom-cli/typedoc.gjs.js --in ./@types/Gjs
scripts.build:docs:try: yarn run clear:docs:try && yarn run typedoc --options ./packages/typedoc-custom-cli/typedoc.try.js
scripts.build:docs: yarn run build:docs:gjs && yarn run build:docs:node-gtk
scripts.build:node-gtk: yarn run build:types:node-gtk && yarn run build:docs:node-gtk
scripts.build:gjs: yarn run build:types:gjs && yarn run build:docs:gjs
scripts.build: yarn run build:gjs && yarn run build:node-gtk
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:gjs && yarn run validate:node-gtk

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
